reviews.review: Eh not a bad game. Some times you get into a competitive game and no one talks.
I've been playing this game since 1999/2000. Almost 20 years later and it is still one of the most enjoyable experiences in the gaming world.
can be very fantastic without cheaters
Despite all of it's flaws this is one of my favourite games to play due to it's high instensity fast paced, competitive style!
